Uses of Class
x.exceptions.FacadeException

  • Packages that use FacadeException 
    Package Description
    e.facade  

    • Uses of FacadeException in e.facade

      Methods in e.facade that throw FacadeException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AdminFacade.createCompany(Company comp)
      this method receives a Company object, checks the DB to see if that name is available, and if so- creates this new Company on the DB.
      void CompanyFacade.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method receives a Coupon object, checks the DB to see if that name is available and if certain coupon attributes are valid, and if so- creates this new coupon on the DB.
      void AdminFacade.createCustomer(Customer cust)
      this method receives a Customer object, checks the DB to see if that name is available, and if so- creates this new Customer on the DB.
      java.util.Collection<Company> AdminFacade.getAllCompanies()
      this method is used to get all existing companies, or an exception if no companies exist.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getAllCompanyCoupons()
      this method is used to retrieve from the DB all the coupons of this company, exception if none exist.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getAllCustomerCoupon()
      this method is used to get all existing coupons purchased by this client, or an exception if no coupons exist.
      java.util.Collection<Customer> AdminFacade.getAllCustomers()
      this method is used to get all existing customers, or an exception if no customers exist.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getCouponsByPrice(double price)
      this method is used to get all existing coupons up to a certain price purchased by this client, or an exception if no coupons exist.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponsByPrice(double price)
      this method is used to retrieve from the DB all the coupons up to a certain price of this company, exception if none exist.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getCouponsByType(CouponType type)
      this method is used to get all existing coupons of certain type purchased by this client, or an exception if no coupons exist.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponsByType(CouponType type)
      this method is used to retrieve from the DB all the coupons of certain type of this company, exception if none exist.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponsUpToDate(java.sql.Date endDate)
      this method is used to retrieve from the DB all the coupons up to a certain date of this company, exception if none exist.
      Company CompanyFacade.getCurrentCompany()
      this is a utility method used to retrieve a Copmany object from the DB with all of it's attributes, after a successful login and facade acquisition.
      void CustomerFacade.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method is used to purchase a coupon.
      void AdminFacade.updateCompany(Company newComp)
      this method receives a Company object, checks to ensure it's updateable attributes are valid, and then updates that company on the DB by retrieving the existing company, setting's its updatable attributes, and sending it to an update.
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon newCoupon)
      this method receives a Coupon object, checks to ensure it's updateable attributes are valid, and then updates that coupon on the DB by retrieving the existing coupon, setting's its updatable attributes, and sending it to an update.
      void AdminFacade.updateCustomer(Customer newCust)
      this method receives a Customer object, checks to ensure it's updateable attributes are valid, and then updates that customer on the DB by retrieving the existing company, setting's its updatable attributes, and sending it to an update.
